p: The cohort from Ticul had the highest seroprevalence (81.1%), followed by Merida (70.2%) and Progreso (57.9%). The differences in seroprevalence estimates by city were statistically significant (p<0.001). Dengue seroprevalence increased with age, and females in the cohort had significantly higher seroprevalence estimates compared with males (p = 0.04) ( Table 3).
